scripts.dev: concurrently -n "frontend,electron" -c "blue,green" "npm run dev --workspace=frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npm run dev --workspace=electron"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=electron
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && git push && git push --tags
